sentence.Network_en: At Monte Cassino he was determined to repeat his earlier performances.

sentence.Network_en: They are elated at their hard - own success at Monte Cassino, where fighting was very severe.

sentence.Network_en: Not until mid - May was Cassino captured , thanks largely to Free French mountain troops from North Africa.
